title: Tetraphiliac

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player at night, you are told if they have a 4 in their post number.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Chosen Non-Town players are told, *"You were investigated by a Tetraphiliac (5444)!"*
- Framed players are framed to have a 4 in their post number.
- Detection Immune players show they do not have a 4 in their post number, and their alert extends to add, *"However, they were told you don't have a 4!"*
- Choosing a player twice will not change the result whether or not their role has changed or if your results would normally be altered.

desc:
Post 5444
*"The number 4 just calls out to me."*
